name: ctxobj
desc: Overloads javascript objects with pushctx() and popctx() functions. They can be used to create derived objects overloaded with a context stack. This module also exports a console() function that can be used to wrap any console-like object in context stack which will be printed as a prefix to any log line.
usage: We use this library to create super readable and easy to read logs for our distributed system. Each log line contains a context stack that can be used to track down flows across processes and servers.
